```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
pilotdata <- read_csv("pilotdata.csv")

# Fix up the names.

pilotdata <- pilotdata %>% 
  rename(latplot = 'Plotted lat.',
         lngplot = 'Plotted long.')

usethis::use_data(pilotdata, overwrite = TRUE)

```
